TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebBrowserPermissionAttribute extends System.Security.Permissions.CodeAccessSecurityAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebBrowserPermissionAttribute Inherits CodeAccessSecurityAttribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 允许对要使用声明性安全应用到代码中的 执行安全操作。

span.span: Allows security actions for to be applied to code using declarative security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制 Web 浏览器控件能够在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 应用程序中运行。 controls the ability of a Web browser control to run in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application. 声明是允许的范围取决于的使用。The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the that is used. 声明的安全特性的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中的存储，以及在运行时访问系统。The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time. 安全特性仅用于声明性安全。Security attributes are used only for declarative security. 对于命令性安全，请使用相应的权限类。For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class, . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 在 XAML 中通常不使用此类。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何要求调用代码具有不受限制权限创建一个 Web 浏览器控件。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has unrestricted permission to create a Web browser control. [!code-csharp[WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets#WebBrowserPermissionAttribute3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#webbrowserpermissionattribute3)] [!code-vb[WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets#WebBrowserPermissionAttribute3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WebBrowserPermissionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#webbrowserpermissionattribute3)]

summary.span: 创建并返回 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates and returns a new instance of the class.
A corresponding to the security declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由安全系统不是由应用程序代码调用方法。The method is called by the security system, not by application code. 所描述的安全信息的属性目标，这是向其类的元数据中存储应用。The security information described by is stored in the metadata of the attribute target, which is the class to which is applied. 系统访问在运行时信息。The system accesses the information at run time. 系统将使用返回的将转换为元数据中存储的可序列化形式的属性目标的安全信息。The system uses the returned by to convert the security information of the attribute target to a serializable form stored in metadata. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员或者通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 。The default value is . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage 此类的成员或者通常不使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能用于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何要求调用代码有权创建在安全级别运行的 Web 浏览器控件。The following example shows how to demand that the calling code has permission to create a Web browser control that runs at a safe level.
